Summary: Very black dot to triangle to line - like smoke trail.
divs: sighting detailsi was on continental flight 1500 out of ft lauderdale enroute to newark ,nj , at 4:30 ( i checked the time) i observed a very black dot against the white clouds out the right side of the aircraft. i estimated several miles away - visibility was good 35000 ft. it seemed like a smoke cloud getting slowly larger and then looked like the shape of a long triangle sitting still, then flattened out and looked like a line of black going opposite our direction. i tried some digital pictures but only got a fuzzy black line. i thought possibly military? but i have never seen the very black trail before. we were above the clouds, probably not seen from the ground \ ocean. i did speak to the pilot, who stated he did not see it. i am curious as to what it was or if anyone else saw it.
